title: Tipity - Tip Calculator

title: Emprise
description: A browser based flight search app that allows a user to select the their origin, destination, start and end date of a trip. Based on the entered inputs the user will see information for the lowest price flights and the current 5 day weather forecast.

title: Half Foods
description: Online grocery store where you can buy items to pickup in store later.
